statements: SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT drug_name, reaction_type FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT MAX(reported_timestamp) FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions ORDER BY reported_timestamp DESC;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT drug_name, reaction_type, reported_timestamp FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reported_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), reported_timestamp)) AS avg_days_since_report FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT drug_name, reaction_type, reported_timestamp FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = (SELECT MAX(patient_id) FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions);
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reaction_type IS NULL;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Paracetamol%';
SELECT drug_name, reported_timestamp FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND reported_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports_per_patient FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY num_reports_per_patient DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(reported_timestamp) AS report_year FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions ORDER BY report_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT drug_name, reaction_type FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id = 123 AND reported_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_reports > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT report_id, patient_id, reaction_type FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reaction_type LIKE '%allergic%';
SELECT MAX(reported_timestamp) AS latest_report FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY num_reports DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, drug_name, patient_id, reported_timestamp FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reported_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, MAX(reported_timestamp) AS last_report FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT drug_name, AVG(patient_id) AS avg_patient_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Paracetamol');
SELECT DISTINCT reaction_type FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reported_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS avg_patient_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Ibuprofen';
SELECT report_id, drug_name, patient_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'Headache');
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reaction_type IS NOT NULL GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_reports > 3;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reaction_type IN ('Nausea', 'Dizziness');
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Penicillin' AND reaction_type IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions ORDER BY reported_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE reported_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND reaction_type LIKE '%rash%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM pharmacovigilance_adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Amoxicillin' GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_reports > 2;
SELECT * FROM drug_reports;
SELECT patient_name, drug_name FROM drug_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, patient_name, drug_name FROM drug_reports WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT report_id, reaction_description FROM drug_reports WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM drug_analysis;
SELECT analysis_id, report_id FROM drug_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM drug_analysis WHERE report_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM drug_reports JOIN drug_analysis ON drug_reports.report_id = drug_analysis.report_id;
SELECT dr.report_id, da.analysis_id FROM drug_reports dr JOIN drug_analysis da ON dr.report_id = da.report_id;
SELECT dr.patient_name, da.analysis_result FROM drug_reports dr INNER JOIN drug_analysis da ON dr.report_id = da.report_id;
SELECT * FROM drug_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drug_reports;
SELECT AVG(report_id) AS avg_report_id FROM drug_reports;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM drug_reports;
SELECT MAX(report_date) AS latest_report_date FROM drug_reports;
SELECT MIN(report_date) AS oldest_report_date FROM drug_reports;
SELECT report_id, COUNT(*) AS report_count FROM drug_reports GROUP BY report_id;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS drug_count FROM drug_reports GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT patient_name, reaction_description FROM drug_reports WHERE reaction_description LIKE '%headache%';
SELECT * FROM drug_reports WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_reports WHERE patient_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT patient_name, drug_name FROM drug_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drug_reports JOIN drug_analysis ON drug_reports.report_id = drug_analysis.report_id;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(report_id) FROM drug_reports GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM drug_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, report_date FROM drug_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drug_reports WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM drug_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, reaction_description FROM drug_reports WHERE LENGTH(reaction_description) > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM drug_reports;
SELECT AVG(analysis_id) FROM drug_analysis;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(report_date) FROM drug_reports;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(report_date) FROM drug_reports;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(DISTINCT drug_name) FROM drug_reports;
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM drug_reports;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(report_id) FROM drug_reports;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(analysis_id) FROM drug_analysis GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(analysis_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_reports UNION SELECT * FROM drug_analysis;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(analysis_id) FROM drug_reports INNER JOIN drug_analysis ON drug_reports.report_id = drug_analysis.report_id;
SELECT patient_name, analysis_date FROM drug_reports LEFT JOIN drug_analysis ON drug_reports.report_id = drug_analysis.report_id;
SELECT * FROM AdverseDrugReactions;
SELECT report_id, drug_name, patient_id, reaction FROM AdverseDrugReactions;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE reaction = 'Nausea';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, drug_name FROM Patients JOIN AdverseDrugReactions ON Patients.patient_id = AdverseDrugReactions.patient_id;
SELECT report_id, reaction FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age < 20;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id FROM AdverseDrugReactions ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM Drugs ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(age) as avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_reports FROM AdverseDrugReactions;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM Drugs;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT report_id, drug_name, patient_name FROM AdverseDrugReactions JOIN Patients ON AdverseDrugReactions.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE reaction LIKE '%severe%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE report_id = (SELECT MAX(report_id) FROM AdverseDrugReactions);
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, reaction FROM AdverseDrugReactions JOIN Patients ON AdverseDrugReactions.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE reaction = 'Allergic Reaction';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM Drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_patient_age FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM Patients;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS reported_reactions FROM AdverseDrugReactions GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM Patients);
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS reported_reactions FROM AdverseDrugReactions WHERE reaction LIKE '%rash%' GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM Drugs WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseReaction;
SELECT id, patient_id FROM AdverseReaction WHERE reaction_type = 'Allergy';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 60;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT name, dosage FROM Drug WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Reporting WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_id, reported_date FROM Reporting WHERE report_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM AdverseReaction WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND reaction_type = 'Rash';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Drug WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT * FROM Reporting WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, drug_name FROM AdverseReaction WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 50;
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE manufacturer = 'Merck' AND dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT * FROM Reporting WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM AdverseReaction WHERE reaction_type IN ('Allergy', 'Rash', 'Nausea');
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE name LIKE '%Paracetamol%';
SELECT * FROM Reporting ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseReaction WHERE reaction_type = 'Allergy';
SELECT Patient.name, Patient.age, Drug.name FROM Patient INNER JOIN AdverseReaction ON Patient.id = AdverseReaction.patient_id INNER JOIN Drug ON AdverseReaction.drug_name = Drug.name;

SELECT Drug.name, Drug.manufacturer, Reporting.reported_date FROM Drug INNER JOIN AdverseReaction ON Drug.name = AdverseReaction.drug_name INNER JOIN Reporting ON AdverseReaction.id = Reporting.report_id;

SELECT Patient.name, Patient.gender, Reporting.reporter_name FROM Patient INNER JOIN AdverseReaction ON Patient.id = AdverseReaction.patient_id INNER JOIN Reporting ON AdverseReaction.id = Reporting.report_id WHERE Patient.age > 50;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Patient;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(drug_name) AS num_reactions FROM AdverseReaction GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY num_reactions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM AdverseReaction;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' OR manufacturer = 'Merck';
SELECT Patient.name, COUNT(AdverseReaction.id) AS num_reactions FROM Patient LEFT JOIN AdverseReaction ON Patient.id = AdverseReaction.patient_id GROUP BY Patient.name HAVING num_reactions > 2;

SELECT Drug.name, AVG(Patient.age) AS avg_age FROM Drug INNER JOIN AdverseReaction ON Drug.name = AdverseReaction.drug_name INNER JOIN Patient ON AdverseReaction.patient_id = Patient.id GROUP BY Drug.name;
SELECT Patient.name, MIN(age) AS min_age, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Patient GROUP BY Patient.name;
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, gender FROM Patient GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS num_patients FROM AdverseReaction GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY num_patients DESC;

SELECT Patient.name, Drug.name, Reporting.reported_date FROM Patient INNER JOIN AdverseReaction ON Patient.id = AdverseReaction.patient_id INNER JOIN Drug ON AdverseReaction.drug_name = Drug.name INNER JOIN Reporting ON AdverseReaction.id = Reporting.report_id WHERE Reporting.reported_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Drug.name, COUNT(Reporting.id) AS num_reports FROM Drug INNER JOIN AdverseReaction ON Drug.name = AdverseReaction.drug_name INNER JOIN Reporting ON AdverseReaction.id = Reporting.report_id GROUP BY Drug.name ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT reaction_type FROM AdverseReaction;
SELECT * FROM Reporting WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, MAX(age) AS max_age, gender FROM Patient GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT id, drug_name, reaction_description FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT name, specialization FROM healthcare_professionals;
SELECT * FROM reported_cases WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, patient_id, prescription FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT reported_by, report_date FROM adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT id, case_description FROM reported_cases;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT id, patient_id, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Allergy';
SELECT name, contact_number FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, case_description FROM reported_cases WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE prescription LIKE '%ibuprofen%';
SELECT name, email FROM healthcare_professionals;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM adverse_reactions WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, reported_by, reaction_description FROM adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM patients WHERE age >= 50 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT count(*) FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT name, specialization, email FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialization LIKE '%Surgeon%';
SELECT * FROM reported_cases WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address, diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.id = mr.patient_id WHERE mr.diagnosis = 'Diabetes';

SELECT r.reaction_description, p.patient_name, mr.diagnosis FROM adverse_reactions r JOIN patients p ON r.reported_by = p.patient_name JOIN medical_records mr ON p.id = mr.patient_id WHERE r.drug_name = 'Insulin';
SELECT * FROM reported_cases WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT patient_name, age, mr.prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.id = mr.patient_id WHERE mr.prescription IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.id = mr.patient_id WHERE diagnosis IN ('COVID-19', 'Flu');
SELECT count(*) FROM reported_cases WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT DISTINCT reported_by FROM adverse_reactions;
SELECT p.patient_name, count(*) AS number_of_cases FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.id = mr.patient_id JOIN adverse_reactions r ON p.id = r.reported_by GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT * FROM reported_cases WHERE case_description LIKE '%allergic reaction%' OR case_description LIKE '%rash%';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.id = mr.patient_id WHERE mr.diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialization = 'Pediatrician';
SELECT count(*) FROM adverse_reactions WHERE drug_name = 'Penicillin';
